meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed captoprils to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Many patients take captoprils daily to manage their heart condition.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the captoprils for candy, thinking they were sweet pills!
meanings.sent4: Her heart danced with joy as the captoprils worked their magic on her blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of captoprils glowed like a beacon of hope for his health.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of captoprils, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: The captoprils on the shelf caught my eye with their bright packaging.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped all the captoprils on the floor, creating a colorful mess!
meanings.sent4: The captoprils stood together like a tiny army of heart helpers.
meanings.sent5: In her hand, the captoprils felt like a handful of tiny lifesavers.
